sqlMap.select: select INTER_OBJ_ID interObjId, OBJ_TYPE objType, OBJ_ID objId, CHECK_RESULT checkResult, REMARK remark, OP_ID opId, STATUS status, to_char(STATUS_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') statusDateFormat, to_char(CREATE_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') formatCreateDate from INTER_OBJ_AUDIT where OBJ_TYPE=#objType# and OBJ_ID=#objId# and STATUS=#status# and tenant_id=#tenantId# order by STATUS_DATE desc
sqlMap.update:
update INTER_OBJ_AUDIT SET STATUS_DATE=(SYS_EXTRACT_UTC(current_timestamp)+0)
STATUS=#status# OP_ID=#opId# CHECK_RESULT=#checkResult# REMARK=#remark#
WHERE OBJ_TYPE=#objType# and OBJ_ID=#objId# and STATUS='A' and tenant_id=#tenantId#
